attributes.action: Stop the inland revenue charging accountants a fee to file tax returns on line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: accountants now have to pay a fee to the inland revenue to be able to file tax returns on line , this service is supposed to save the tax man work and money so how come i have to pay more to file my accounts ?? ,  Well tax man YOU get all our tax forms in good old paper until this  charge is taken away
